title: Cristian Martínez (Colombian footballer)
text:
Cristian Martínez Borja (born 1 January 1988 in <a href="Quibd%C3%B3">Quibdó</a>, <a href="Colombia">Colombia</a>) is a Colombian <a href="Footballer%20%28soccer%29">footballer</a> playing for <a href="L.D.U.%20Quito">L.D.U. Quito</a>.
Career.
Born in <a href="Quibd%C3%B3">Quibdó</a>, <a href="Colombia">Colombia</a>, he made his senior debut with <a href="Patriotas%20Boyac%C3%A1">Patriotas</a> playing in the <a href="2006%20Categor%C3%ADa%20Primera%20B%20season">2006 Categoría Primera B season</a>, before he moved to <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>ian club <a href="Sport%20Club%20Internacional">Internacional</a> in 2007. In January 2008 he joined <a href="Mogi%20Mirim%20Esporte%20Clube">Mogi Mirim</a>. He scored one goal for Mogi Mirim in 2008 <a href="Campeonato%20Paulista%20S%C3%A9rie%20A2">Campeonato Paulista Série A2</a>. Then he played in <a href="Guaratinguet%C3%A1%20Futebol">Guaratinguetá</a>, where he scored one goal in <a href="Campeonato%20Brasileiro%20S%C3%A9rie%20C">Campeonato Brasileiro Série C</a>. In 2009, he joined <a href="Sociedade%20Esportiva%20e%20Recreativa%20Caxias%20do%20Sul">Caxias do Sul</a> and later in 2010 he was loaned to <a href="Clube%20de%20Regatas%20do%20Flamengo">Flamengo</a>.
He came to Serbia in December 2010 and signed a loan deal with <a href="Red%20Star%20Belgrade">Red Star Belgrade</a> after being recommended to the club by their former player <a href="Dejan%20Petkovi%C4%87">Dejan Petković</a>. Using Serbian transliteration his name is written as "Kristijan Borha" (Кристијан Борха) .
On 11 April 2012 he scored a goal in the <a href="Eternal%20derby%20%28Serbia%29">derby</a> against <a href="FK%20Partizan">Partizan</a> after coming on from the bench. This was Borja's first goal in a derby, meanwhile Red Star went through after winning both Cup matches 2–0 and 0–2.
On 18 June 2012, he stopped playing for Red Star and went back to Caxias do Sul. On 3 August he signed a one-year contract with Colombian side <a href="Independiente%20Santa%20Fe">Santa Fe</a>.
On 15 August 2013, he joined Mexican side <a href="Tiburones%20Rojos%20de%20Veracruz">Tiburones Rojos de Veracruz</a> playing in the <a href="Liga%20MX">Liga MX</a>.
